description:
Buzz transcribes and translates audio offline on your personal computer. Powered by OpenAI's Whisper.


What's Changed
- Update language translations
- Update docs
- Publish to PyPI
- Upgrade to Whisper v3 in #626
- Fix OpenAI API transcriber audio limits
- Add folder watch
- Update Linux Snap build
- Add URL imports
- Fix CLI generating blank filenames
- Save transcriptions to SQLite
- Fix Linux Keyring exceptions in #685
- Add transcript text viewer in #686
New Contributors
- @albanobattistella made their first contribution in #592
- @fitojb made their first contribution in #628
- @Sebek05 made their first contribution in #658
